dialogue.utterance: Well...I guess I'd do it all different. First off, I wouldn't live in the same state where we pull our jobs. We'd live in one state and stay clean there, and when we wanted to take a bank, we'd go to another state...and...

dialogue.context: She is silent.
dialogue.utterance: Bonnie?
dialogue.speaker: CLYDE
dialogue.context: But she does not answer.
dialogue.utterance: Hey, Bonnie?

dialogue.utterance: Sure, drive with one eye shut.
